member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.BaseRequest.AccountExternalId
member.summary: The AccountExternalID is your unique record to identify your account. This ID should be in your CRM.

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.BaseRequest.ContactExternalId
member.summary: The contactExternalId must be unique within the account. This could be a email address, a unique record that is also contained in your CRM, or the ID of the contact record of your CRM.

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.IncrementAttributeRequest.Name
member.summary: (Required)- Name of the field to be updated

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.IncrementAttributeRequest.Value
member.summary: (Required)- Value to add to current value (can be positive or negative).

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.SetAttributeRequest.Name
member.summary: (Required)- Name of the field to be updated

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.TrackEventRequest.EventName
member.summary: (required)- This is the unique name of the event (i.e Sent Blog Post). If the Event Name is not found it will be created.

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.TrackEventRequest.Description
member.summary: (optional)- A description of the Event (i.e Blog Title)

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.TrackEventRequest.Quantity
member.summary: (optional)- The number related to this event (Commonly used to track things like email sent, etc)

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Models.Request.TrackEventRequest.Customfields
member.summary: (optional)-Additional custom fields in a name/value pair. Important Note: At this time, custom fields cannot be created on the fly. Please make sure to request any required custom field(s) before attempting to send any data. Requests can be made through your ChurnZero Implementation Specialist or by reaching out to support@churnzero.net.

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Settings.ApiSettings.ApiBaseUrl
member.summary: If you are located in Europe/Asia call https://eu1analytics.churnzero.net/i If not call https://analytics.churnzero.net/i

member.name: P:ChurnZeroApiClient.Settings.ApiSettings.AppKey
member.summary: Every request must include your appKey which can be found on the Admin > AppKey Page.
